title: Sunset Symphony
description: A vibrant sunset landscape capturing the golden hour's warm embrace. This piece explores the interplay of light and shadow as the sun dips below the horizon, painting the sky with fiery oranges and soft purples. 24x36 inches, 2024.
processNotes: Created over 3 weeks with daily plein air studies

title: Whispers of the Forest
description: An intimate exploration of forest textures and light filtering through ancient trees. This piece captures the quiet majesty of nature's cathedral with layered greens and golden highlights. 18x24 inches, 2023.
processNotes: Inspired by a morning hike in the local forest reserve

title: Urban Reverie
description: An abstract interpretation of city life and human connection, blending geometric forms with organic textures. This piece explores the rhythm of urban existence through bold contrasts and layered compositions. 30x40 inches, 2024.
processNotes: Developed from urban photography studies and memory

title: Ocean's Memory
description: A delicate watercolor study of ocean waves and their eternal dance with the shore. This piece captures the fluidity and movement of water through translucent layers and careful wet-on-dry techniques. 16x20 inches, 2023.
processNotes: Painted en plein air during coastal residency

title: Midnight Garden
description: A nocturnal floral study illuminated by soft moonlight, exploring the mystery and beauty of night-blooming flowers. Rich blues and silvers create a dreamlike atmosphere. 20x24 inches, 2024.
processNotes: Painted under full moonlight for authentic lighting

title: Golden Horizon
description: A majestic landscape capturing the golden hour over rolling hills. This piece celebrates the warmth of sunlight and the infinite possibilities of the horizon. 22x28 inches, 2024.
processNotes: Inspired by early morning landscape studies
